programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: "Weak Link" - Tanner visits Mitch, tours the Islands, and befriends a dying girl. After failing her initial "test", Dawn challenges Sean to a dangerous contest with her future at Baywatch hanging in the balance. JD competes to join the America's Cup Sailing Team.

programme.desc: "Shark Island" - Tanner believes The Shark Island Legend. Mitch doesn't. Team Baywatch competes with the Coast Guard. Jessie and Kekoa both dump JD. Swimming naked in a Hawaiian purification ritual, Jesse has to make a rescue in the nude.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: 'Nightmare Bay, Part 1'' - Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Nightmare Bay, Part 2'' - When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the "Creature in the Bay" is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The One Who Got Away'' - After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence - unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.desc: A teenager went missing after an evening of horseback riding. Her body was found a month later, three miles from her home. The killer unknowingly left trace evidence behind - tiny but unmistakable clues which pointed to him and him alone.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Spanish Fly E7 "Expedition to the Seychelles" (2009)
Spanish Fly E8 "Expedition to the Seychelles Pt. 2" (2009)
The "Off-Season" S1:E7 "Tree Management"
programme.desc: When people think of creating food sources on their property for deer and other wildlife, the first thing that comes to mind are food plots. While these can produce a high volume of palatable forage, another great option is to plant trees. A variety of soft and hard mass orchards, if cared for properly, can provide another great source of nutrition year round, taking the quality of deer on your property to the next level!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E8 "Plantation Story"
programme.desc: Every year we try to incorporate new projects to drastically change the quality of habitat we have on the farm for our wildlife. A couple of years ago that project was to create a small hunting plot in the middle of a heavily wooded area in one of our prime hunting locations. This project has turned into what we now call “The Plantation Plot”. As a deer manager creating habitat for the wildlife is one of the most rewarding things you can do. In previous episodes, we went over things like what to do prior to planting, annual vs perennial plots, and even breaking down brand new property. But in this episode we will come full circle, and apply all of those concepts, to create a successful food plot from scratch.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E9 "Frost Seeding"
programme.desc: Frost Seeding. It's a practice commonly overlooked, but when done correctly can produce major results at a time when wildlife need it the most! And with very little equipment required, this method of establishing food plots is perfect for just about anyone!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E10 "Trapping"
programme.desc: In the previous episodes of The “Off-Season”, we have talked about creating food sources and building habitat for the wildlife on your property. While these areas of land management are crucial, a successful land manager must also keep their eye on the predator population. Animals such as coyotes, raccoons, and fisher, as well as fox and possums, all prey on either young turkeys or young deer, making it important to control their numbers in order to have the best hunting opportunities.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E1 "Who We Are"
programme.desc: Welcome to the very first episode of The Bearded Buck's brand-new land management series called, The "Off-Season". This series will consist of short episodes dealing with the specifics of our land management tactics including everything from food plots, timber stand improvement, property development, trapping, and much more. We hope to show more of what it takes to set up a successful farm and what we do when we are not sitting in a tree stand hunting.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E2 "Soil Samples"
programme.desc: In order to be a successful land manager that maintains a healthy wildlife population, your food plots need to be at the top of their game. The best way to achieve a productive food plot is to know exactly what type of soil your land has and what it needs to produce high quality forage. This is where soil samples come into play, arguably the most important step in the entire food plot process!

programme.title: Jeff Allen - I Can Laugh About it Now
programme.desc: Jeff Allen combines clean, hilarious humor like no other comedian working today. Besides performing at corporate functions and fundraisers, he regularly appears on television, radio, and casinos across the country. Consistently making heroes out of meeting planners, Jeff Allen provides world-class comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Corey Rodrigues - People Whisperer
programme.desc: Corey is a highly sought after national touring college, club and corporate and cruise ship performer. He was the winner of The Catch a New Rising Star, The Funniest Comic in New England and the 2017 Big Sky Comedy Festivals. Rodrigues has been featured on the hilarious Gotham Live, Laughs on Fox and True Tv's Laff Mobbs Laff Tracks television shows and currently can be heard on Sirius XM. He combines comedy from his own life and the lives of those around him. Mix that with a hilarious point of view and he's able to talk about just about anything.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brad Trackman - Thanks
programme.desc: Brad Trackman is a national touring comedian who has been featured on a number of well-known comedy shows and channels.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Richard Sarvate - Missed the Window
programme.desc: Richard Sarvate quit his ten year programming career in Silicon Valley to be a stand up comedian. Oops! Now he spends his nights poking fun at tech jobs.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Reno Collier - Monkeys and Stuff
programme.desc: Reno's journey began at the Punchline Comedy Club in Atlanta, GA where he tended bar to supplement his day job. He found himself on stage during the weekly open mic night. His unique outlook on life - mixed with a six-pack, was instantly popular.

programme.title: Lamont Ferguson - You Had All Day
programme.desc: Ferguson has appeared on the Tonight Show, Comedy Central, Comics Unleashed and ABCís Family Channel. He was the Winner of the Seattle International Comedy Competition, Three time semi-finalist at the Boston Comedy Festival, Finalist in the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and named ëBest of Festî at the Detroit, Lucky Eagle and San Luis Obispo Comedy Festivals. He has the distinction of being one of the only comics in the country that has opened for all of the following comedians: Steve Harvey, George Lopez, Larry Miller, Garry Shandling, Richard Jeni, and George Carlin.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tyler Boeh - Wait For It
programme.desc: Who goes from being a mild-mannered nationally recognized college a Capella group vocal percussionist to becoming a high-energy, intelligent, physical, and downright silly beatboxing comedian? None other than Comedian Tyler Boeh, who shifted his focus from singing a Capella (a word he describes as Latin for “Without Girlfriend”) when he won a comedy contest in Portland Oregon. After winning and placing in the finals of numerous Comedy Competitions from San Francisco to Seattle to Boston to The World Series of Comedy, Boeh not only launched a great career in comedy including television appearances, colleges, cruise ships and headlining clubs, he also found a girlfriend. Tyler’s comedy CD was chosen by LaughSpin Magazine as the Best Comedy Album of 2012 and you may have seen him on such shows as Celebrity Name Game, Moms Rule, Nesn Comedy All Stars, or heard him on SIRIUS radio. Don’t miss a chance to see Tyler live.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: John Branyan - Demeaning of Life

programme.title: Daren Streblow - Organic and Inorganic Life
programme.desc: Daren Streblow’s unique style of observational stand-up comedy has been entertaining hundreds-of-thousands of people throughout the United States and around the world since he first stepped on the stage in 1995. Daren headlines churches, fundraisers, corporate functions, and colleges all over North America. He’s a “humor opportunist” who is always looking for the comical side of life and how people live it. He takes topics that everyone can relate to and filters them through his unique lens where connecting A to B leads to a letter in the Greek alphabet or maybe salad dressing.

programme.title: Billy Anderson - America's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Born in Texas and raised in Augusta, Georgia ñ Billy Anderson is stand-up comedian currently living in Seattle, Washington. Heís been seen regionally at SketchFest Seattle, The Washington Comedy Festival, Bumbershoot and was a finalist in the 2016 Seattle International Comedy Competition. Outside of the Northwest, Billy has written for Cracked.Com, performed in SF Sketchfest, LaLaFest Los Angeles, the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and as of 2013 he has performed stand-up comedy in every US state. Billy was recently featured on Audibleís ìSounds Like Americaî hosted by Jackie Kashian and the syndicated program ìLaughsî on Fox television.

programme.title: War of the Worlds

As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.
